body: After talking with Ansa decided that interests are enough for now and possibly add skill selection as a later feature.
email with regex is working https://www.sitepoint.com/javascript-validate-email-address-regex/ was helpful
Not going to have phone number validation since international and people have their ways of entering a phone number.
also not working on development
was able to update the phone number but still looks like interests are not updating along with needing to update name. will need to test country and regions
connected to staging test for givelight staging2.givelight.org

Login is working now but:
1. You have to use https and not http:   https://givelight.herokuapp.com
2. There is some other issue on the profile page, probably some bad DB data. Will fix that before closing this issue.
cleanup-reoganizing branch did it.
Has been made better could use another look through later
starting config/projectInfoData.json so will add more as needed.

this is actually two issues, refactoring code and then adding redux. refactoring has been doing some in cleanup-reorganizing and will likely need further once redux is in but now that branch is done time  to add redux.
editing of user details by the user _id is working but will need to test more with email and name.
removed volenteerInterests and not seeing it in local db. able to find a user by id for now so indexing not needed till searching through volunteers.
am all for this, would you mind integrating it into project @naderchehab ?
I saw something like this and yes we will need to add this. Where are the locations to add it? In lib/db.js in the signup and login but what about db schemas to store the passphrase properly?
Great idea. Should we also think about what other paths as well?
Oh yes we need this. Have you started on it?
What is suppose to go in the menu? @naderchehab @RaghuMurugesan
added in branch bycrypt-integration.
No I haven't, just thought about it.

any route that does user insert, update or even view will need this. We will need to have two kinds of accounts:
- admin accounts that can view/edit any user or other data
- user accounts that have limited access. Can only view/edit their own accounts but not any other account.
Yes I can do this one, assigned to myself.

I think there is an overlap between this issue and the task to integrate this signup flow with the existing givelight webiste. Once this happens, then the menu will have whatever actions the current givelight.org menu has.
agreed @nbhambhani @anupaddy @RaghuMurugesan @naderchehab would anyone like to take this on?

Yes we are integrated to their staging site which just redirects to our heroku app. We would need a way for the volunteer to get back to the next steps on the givelight.org site after they signup so probably just a button that links back to givelight for now?
Ok makes sense. Still it would be good if we could style our app to look the same as the existing site so people don't think like they left the website.
do we need to secure it from the frontend or in a specific location or just using bycrypt in db.js when signing up and logging in is enough for now? @naderchehab
I think bcrypt does the job. 👍  If we find anything else we can open a new issue.
or should this be a website v2 thing after we initially deploy?
